data.name: Zombie Escape : Apocalypse
data.description:
ZOMBIE ESCAPE for Oculus Quest is a immersive and terrifying VR game that puts you in the middle of a city overrun by zombies. As the player, you must complete missions, collect weapons and ammunition, and avoid contact with the undead to make your way to safety. 
Each mission presents a new challenge and requires quick reflexes and strategic planning to succeed.

But it's not just about staying alive â€“ you'll also need to complete a series of missions to progress through the game. These could include finding key items, rescuing survivors, or sabotaging enemy structures. Whatever it takes to make your way out of the city and reach safety.

With immersive gameplay, realistic graphics, and intense action, ZOMBIE ESCAPE: APOCALYPSE is a must-play for fans of the zombie genre and virtual reality gaming. Can you make it out alive?

Can you outsmart the zombies and escape the city before it's too late? Play ZOMBIE ESCAPE on Oculus Quest and find out if you have what it takes to survive the zombie apocalypse in virtual reality.
